reviews.text:
The quality seems to have diminished. I question if it changed ownership.

Nevertheless, the pizza is still good. They are one of the best places to get sausage and cheese pizza.

Unfortunately, the neighborhood around it has gone down hill.

It was Saturday night in the psych ward at Niagara Regional Hospital. I had begged to be taken to a Catholic Hospital and when I tried to bolt thats when protocol dictated that I needed to be in my room under guard. They sent the nicest guards to sit at the door who didnt rat me out when I spit out the medicine that I cheeked. I took the Risportal bec for a short period of time it doesnt really affect you but i spit out the benzo. If im gonna die might as well be Big Pharma. Maybe a white van will pull up and they'll throw me in and take me finally to College Hospital. But back to Niagara Memorial Hospital they were so nice. Now dont get me wrong they were super nice to me at two of the psych wards in Monmouth County. I never had the chance to try out Red Bank where my sister works but I did try out Long Branch and I also tried out Neptune. Neptune psych is unbelievable Monmouth psych wasnt as clean and i wasnt that crazy about the food. I mean I was crazy, and the food made me crazier but I wasn't crazy in the colloquial usage of that word. My thoughts often wander back to that Saturday night at Niagara Memorial Hospital. The kindest guard walked me down the hallway. He said surprise once a week they bring in pizza. From where, I asked. From Frenchie's. Not just pizza but also wings. That pizza and wing combo that Saturday night was m'ayn oilum habuh. However something I learned from MCCI is that when somebody is in crisis you dont serve them chicken on a bone because God forbid they can choke on it. Wednesday was chicken dinner at MCCI. I nearly fought a boy who took my chicken thats how good that chicken tasted. I love Calvin who ran the MCCI kitchen. I owe everything to Sergeant Scalese who got me a job in the kitchen. A black apron meant you worked in the officer's dining room. On Tuesday and Friday they baked fres pizza to the officer's. Leftovers were given to the kitchen staff. The MCCI kitchen will always be my favorite kitchen and maybe one day I'll be a kitchen tech there. Shout out to Higgins :)

Yuuuuckkkkk !!!
Ordered a honey garlic chicken pizza. Pizza was DISGUSTING and drenched in honey garlic. It was so inedible and they forgot my 4 cups of bbq which i was charged for and the delivery kid said was IN the box. Called store and snotty female manager said she made it and dumped the extra sauce from the bowl ontop of the pizza after shaking the fingers. I said I wanted a refund and to come get it bc I tried to eat it and couldn't. I ate less than a slice and my husband did the same. And told the manager it was missing. The delivery kid came and tried to say he wasn't giving me the money back bc pizza was missing and ended in me calling the manager back and getting into a screaming match over them trying to not give me the money even though she was aware that 2 pieces were bitten into and missing BEFORE she offered to refund it. Horrible customer service. Horrible food. Idk what MANAGER pours this much wet sauce on top of pizza. Save your money!!!!

I ordered 20 wings from these guys and when I got my order the wing box was fully wrapped in plastic wrap not venting out any steam so when I open my wing box they were soggy and rubbery I ate them anyway and that was a huge mistake. Number 1 I could taste the dirty oil they were cooked in, 2 gave me instant heartburn, 3 woke up in the middle of the night needing to go to the bathroom had me sick all night. Do not go to this establishment. There are plenty of other quality pizza and wing shops to go to.
Absolutely love the NY style pizza. Most definitely in a compromised area, but a gem for the locals. Loved it!!! Wonderful Buffalo chicken pizza and super cheesy pepperoni!!!

editorial_summary.overview: Informal pizza parlor featuring classic pies, wings, fries & subs for eat-in or takeout.

recentReviews.text: My first time here, I gave them compliments from people that enjoy their food, the pizza was absolutely deliciously splendid! üòã

I love Frenchies chicken. It‚Äôs always been a favorite of mine. I ordered a Greek salad tonight over the phone and asked for no onions and a lady with a thick accent told me there‚Äôs no onions in it rudely. I‚Äôve gotten this dish several times but didn‚Äôt care to argue. I‚Äôm pretty sure she had the cooks put extra in my salad out of spite, now unfortunately I won‚Äôt be order from a local favorite anymore.

Best pizza in niagara falls every time I cross the bridge its a must I stop there the steak pizza is good topped wit Lettuce n tomatoes the buffalo chicken is nice n rich the hot pepper is hot if u like spice
The steakPizza doesn't taste as good as it used to before.They switched owners, but they are fast and reliable
People are nice, food is garbage. You can buy better meatballs at the grocery store. Pasta overcooked, salad was a joke. And the prices are stupid.

We ordered 2 Steak and cheese subs and fries, gravy on side. As always food arrived as ordered, hot and delicious. Totally satisfied our late night cravings. Sometimes our inner carnivore needs to be satisfied! ü§£ ü§£ ü§£  They have amazing gravy!
Staff was friendly but pizza slices were not very warm. Cheese had begun to harden and the buffalo chicken pizza lacks real flavor. Likely not returning
I liked it been before they sold the place,now the prices are high and the food is ok

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Brenner
detailedReviews.text: Just ordered from there via door dash. Best pizza I‚Äôve had in a long time. Will order from there again

detailedReviews.author: Pray for Palestine
detailedReviews.text: It was Saturday night in the psych ward at Niagara Regional Hospital. I had begged to be taken to a Catholic Hospital and when I tried to bolt thats when protocol dictated that I needed to be in my room under guard. detailedReviews.author: anthony ziurinskas
detailedReviews.text: Called to order food but was answered by someone who couldn't speak English which made it extremely lengthy and difficult to order. When my delivery arrived the time prior the driver insisted I tip in cash and not on card saying he wouldn't get it which seemed incorrect.

detailedReviews.author: MB P
detailedReviews.text:
The quality seems to have diminished. I question if it changed ownership.

Nevertheless, the pizza is still good. They are one of the best places to get sausage and cheese pizza.

Unfortunately, the neighborhood around it has gone down hill.

detailedReviews.author: Megan Golden
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and very fresh. Fresh out the oven. And the honey garlic & steak & cheese pizza are to die√® for.

detailedReviews.author: Nick Behm
detailedReviews.text: I ordered 20 wings from these guys and when I got my order the wing box was fully wrapped in plastic wrap not venting out any steam so when I open my wing box they were soggy and rubbery I ate them anyway and that was a huge mistake. Number 1 I could taste the dirty oil they were cooked in, 2 gave me instant heartburn, 3 woke up in the middle of the night needing to go to the bathroom had me sick all night. Do not go to this establishment. There are plenty of other quality pizza and wing shops to go to.

detailedReviews.author: Victor Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: The slices were big and the pizza was really good

detailedReviews.author: Alfred Ligammari
detailedReviews.text: Some of my favorite pizza in Niagara falls. Absolutely fantastic.

detailedReviews.author: Nancy McIvor
detailedReviews.text: We usually order chicken fingers or wings. The portion size of fingers is very generous and the counter girl, Ashlyn was delightful.

detailedReviews.author: Derek Gilland
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza and wings

detailedReviews.author: Carl Daniels
detailedReviews.text: Assortment of pizza which is very good . Love the menu üòã

detailedReviews.author: paul wysocki
detailedReviews.text: Recently every time I go in pizza is completely flat and pooled in grease. This was one of my favorite spots in Niagara falls untill the last few months and the trip there today has me questioning even going back again. Completely soaked in Grease and tastes like a pizza that was made yesterday and reheated really disappointed because they were one of the only places left with good slices but looks like i lll have to find another go to as this place just isnt worth paying 2.50 a slice for grease pooled on flat dough. Use to rate this place 5 stars it's now down to two at best after the last few visits.

detailedReviews.author: steven jones
detailedReviews.text: Been going here for years never had any problems. Always great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Robert N
detailedReviews.text:
Frenchys Pizza used to be good but lately it's terrible. Just doordashed a pepperoni pizza from them and the pizza is undercooked. Food is inconsistent and unreliable.
I Will NOT be purchasing Frenchys pizza again.

detailedReviews.author: Dale S
detailedReviews.text: I got a steak and cheese sub the roll was not tossed it's was soggy. The sub was cold not even warm. It was a waste of $15

detailedReviews.author: Matt K
detailedReviews.text: Hands down...Frenchy's is my favorite pizza in the world!! My only issue is the prices, which is why i visit once a month now! üéÖü§∂‚òÉÔ∏èüéÑüéÅ

detailedReviews.author: Brenda King
detailedReviews.text: Waited an hour and a half for food. Then had to call back because they forgot my pop still waiting for that 30 minutes and counting . I should have been priority since it was there mistake especially since I already had to wait

detailedReviews.author: Josh French
detailedReviews.text: From one Frenchy to another! The slice was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Sims
detailedReviews.text: Fish dinners were so clearly over cooked and the fries under cooked

detailedReviews.author: Twilight_gacha Twilight_gacha
detailedReviews.text:
Wasn't As Good As Usual
Probably won't order from there for a while

detailedReviews.author: Bianca Broadwell
detailedReviews.text: This is horrible I order this last night and I asked for them to make another and I'd pay for delivery  because I didn't want to take my baby out at 11 pm he refused I paid to get a half a tray that clearly looks shaken and dropped  if only I could post the picture smh

detailedReviews.author: FM
detailedReviews.text:
Drove down from Canada for the day and wanted to try out a new place. I stumbled across here and glad I came because the sicilian style slices were so good. The cheese they use is phenomenal which I mentioned the the lady working up front. I always end up missing buffalo chicken loving in Canada and this place was truly amazing. Kind and wonderful staff working here. Thank you for being so amazing! :)

God bless America

detailedReviews.author: Trina
detailedReviews.text: Live there pizza

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Ihus
detailedReviews.text: I liked the Pizza. Red sauce is sweet and bold, the way I like! Update from about a year ago. I still get pizza here, half tray of pepperoni please, $21 and change. Best pizza in town. Sometimes I get lots of extra pepperoni, sometimes its perfectly proportional, but it's ALWAYS Great Pizza. Thanks Frenchies.

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Pelfrey
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was soooo good!

detailedReviews.author: Sean Cameron
detailedReviews.text: Terrible don't ear here.  New owners changed things now it sucks. Why buy a successful business & change  things?  Stop being cheap.

detailedReviews.author: DONALD FONSECA
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was all crust ate here all the time never again yuck

detailedReviews.author: Clarissa Wojewoda
detailedReviews.text: I was impressed that the establishment called to verify details of steak submarine order as specification was not available on the doordash app. Plus food is always buh buh buh banging.

detailedReviews.author: Sylvia Casal
detailedReviews.text: Quick delivery, delicious food!!

detailedReviews.author: BladeTribalLord
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was really good

detailedReviews.author: Mrs. Smith 007
detailedReviews.text: Ok so, went to Frenchies before heading home from Niagara Falls with the pups. Ordered takeout, peronal pan pizza extra cheese and extra extra pepperoni. I had to try a slice before I wrote the review. If this was the Quiet Place Day One, I would travel here to get my last slice of pizza. Amazing food and service. Thanks for making my 4th of July delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Millie King
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely love the NY style pizza. Most definitely in a compromised area, but a gem for the locals. Loved it!!! Wonderful Buffalo chicken pizza and super cheesy pepperoni!!!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Vathy
detailedReviews.text: Food is terrible!! Idk what happen to this place.

detailedReviews.author: Laurie Brinson
detailedReviews.text: FOOD IS GREAT AND I WILL GET MORE AGAIN SOON.

detailedReviews.author: Shelby Santana
detailedReviews.text:
Yuuuuckkkkk !!!
Ordered a honey garlic chicken pizza. Pizza was DISGUSTING and drenched in honey garlic. It was so inedible and they forgot my 4 cups of bbq which i was charged for and the delivery kid said was IN the box. Called store and snotty female manager said she made it and dumped the extra sauce from the bowl ontop of the pizza after shaking the fingers. I said I wanted a refund and to come get it bc I tried to eat it and couldn't. I ate less than a slice and my husband did the same. And told the manager it was missing. Horrible customer service. Horrible food. Idk what MANAGER pours this much wet sauce on top of pizza. Save your money!!!!

detailedReviews.text: Pizza had a cockroach in it .

detailedReviews.author: SYED Gilani
detailedReviews.text: The pizza had insects in it also the lady in red shirt on counter dropped my pizza in the back then picked it up and handed it over to me .

detailedReviews.author: Victor Lord
detailedReviews.text: Rude Staff

detailedReviews.author: alaycia Kubik
detailedReviews.text: best pizza in the Niagara Falls area their food is amazinggg hands down ‚ò∫Ô∏è cheese ham & bacon is fire ü§§

detailedReviews.author: Christen V
detailedReviews.text: This was bought recently and I was not happy with the pizza at all.  The crust just tasted like you were eating flour. The pizza didn't have much flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Wƒ±ƒçƒ∑'ƒë ≈ò…ô≈üƒ±≈°»õƒÉ≈Ñƒçƒó
detailedReviews.text: Wasted $50 dollars on inedible subs. Ordered 2 royal subs extra Toasted. Drive and get them. They are soaking wet not Toasted one bit. Call ask for new ones. Receive 1 new sub. That is still a soaking mess and has been Toasted for literally one second. I tried to toast it myself but it was literally inedible. I used their contact form online to try and talk with a manager. Do you think they could respond? NO 4 days later and nothing. Never again. Don't waste your money on their subs all of them are absolutely terrible. I can't imagine anyone that wants a completely untoasted soggy sub. Just gross.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Newman
detailedReviews.text: I get the same thing every time I come 3 slices of banana pepper pizza a salad and Schweppes and it's always good and hot!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Alice Martin
detailedReviews.text: Very nice place clean friendly Great service

detailedReviews.author: Carlos Williams
detailedReviews.text: Great service, food is always excellent. If u like different flavor of pizza stop by.had a steak and cheese slice and sausage slice delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Roberto Mu√±oz
detailedReviews.text: Nice little place, I ordered to go and they were great

detailedReviews.author: Jason Atkinson
detailedReviews.text: INCREDIBLE.  First time in Niagra Falls.  My fiance and I got a half tray pepperoni pizza and it blew our minds.  Everything about it was great.  I'm a huge pizza guy and this is already in my top 5 all time.  Also, the Funnel Cake Fries are RIDICULOUSLY good.... our mouths dropped to the floor we couldn't believe how good they were.  Will be sad I'm too far away to visit this place for a while.

detailedReviews.author: India Johnson
detailedReviews.text: The best wings around üçó

detailedReviews.author: Michael Mt Pleasant
detailedReviews.text: Order dinner last night, pizza topping were not right. Worker was very rude on the phone and refused to make the order right. I am going to due business elsewhere.

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Houston
detailedReviews.text: Order a pizza, they got it wrong, won't do anything to compensate for it

detailedReviews.author: Doug Cain
detailedReviews.text: My wife said it was a staple...it was good pizza but not near what her twenty something memories led her to believe. Tasty pizza square style. Would eat again when back in the Falls area

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious and varied pizza options, including unique flavors like steak and cheese, honey garlic, and buffalo chicken. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The food consistently arrives hot and as ordered, satisfying late-night cravings with reliable delivery service. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The freshness of the pizza, especially when it comes straight out of the oven, is highly appreciated by customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding food quality and service inconsistencies - review management can address this concern
Communication barriers and ordering difficulties due to language issues - text messaging can bring customers back to your restaurant and build a loyal text club for promotions
Perceived decline in food quality and consistency after ownership change - social media marketing can improve this area
